name: Tri-Tool Theft
description:
You play as a robot who's trying to do a heist. For this, you get the help of three other robots : the good, the bad and the ugly.

Team : 

  • Jeremy (Art)
  • Zack (Art)
  • Yassine (Prog)
  • Sam (Prog)
  • Fabian (Prog)

To follow the optional constraint "AI Generated", we used ChatGPT to help think about game ideas, but we didn't take one it proposed. We also used Soundraw to generate the main menu music. For this we choosed a "laid back" ambience with synths.
